name: The Community Resource Center
materials: Computer (Reuse); Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
The Community Resource Center is a non-profit organization based in Nashville that provides a collection program for fully working, unneeded computers.  After they completly check the computers to ensure that they work properly, they then redistribute the computers to schools in need of them.
They offer pick-up service to companies donating large quantities of computers.
